languages.text: "Может, и делаем. Но какая разница? Ты ведь хочешь жить своим умом, а не как прикажут, верно? Право ошибаться тоже надо отстаивать".
"Perhaps we are. But what difference does it make? You want to live however you think is best, don't you? Not as you are told to live? The right to make mistakes is one worth fighting for."
languages.original_text: "Может, и делаем. Но какая разница? Ты ведь хочешь жить своим умом, а не как прикажут, верно? Право ошибаться тоже надо отстаивать".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps we are. But what difference does it make? You want to live however you think is best, don't you? Not as you are told to live? The right to make mistakes is one worth fighting for."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps we are. But what difference does it make? You want to live however you think is best, don't you? Not as you are told to live? The right to make mistakes is one worth fighting for."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps we are. But what difference does it make? You want to live however you think is best, don't you? Not as you are told to live? The right to make mistakes is one worth fighting for."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “或许是吧，但这又怎么样呢？你是想以你认为最合适的方式生活，不是吗？你不想在别人的指指点点下生活吧？犯错是值得为之奋斗的权利。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps we are. But what difference does it make? You want to live however you think is best, don't you? Not as you are told to live? The right to make mistakes is one worth fighting for."

traits.locale_text: “或许是吧，但这又怎么样呢？你是想以你认为最合适的方式生活，不是吗？你不想在别人的指指点点下生活吧？犯错是值得为之奋斗的权利。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Allez savoir. De toute façon, qu'est-ce que ça change ? Vous voulez vivre comment vous l'entendez, non ? Et pas comme on vous dit de vivre ? Dans ce cas, on a parfaitement le droit de faire des erreurs. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps we are. But what difference does it make? You want to live however you think is best, don't you? Not as you are told to live? The right to make mistakes is one worth fighting for."

traits.locale_text: « Allez savoir. De toute façon, qu'est-ce que ça change ? Vous voulez vivre comment vous l'entendez, non ? Et pas comme on vous dit de vivre ? Dans ce cas, on a parfaitement le droit de faire des erreurs. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Es posible. Pero ¿acaso importa? Querías vivir como tú creas oportuno, ¿no? En vez de solo vivir como te dicen que tienes que vivir. El derecho a equivocarse es algo por lo que vale la pena luchar».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps we are. But what difference does it make? You want to live however you think is best, don't you? Not as you are told to live? The right to make mistakes is one worth fighting for."

traits.locale_text: «Es posible. Pero ¿acaso importa? Querías vivir como tú creas oportuno, ¿no? En vez de solo vivir como te dicen que tienes que vivir. El derecho a equivocarse es algo por lo que vale la pena luchar».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「たぶんね。でも、どんな違いがあるんだい？アンタは自分のベストを尽くして何としても生き延びたいんだろ？生きるよう命令されたから、ってわけじゃないだろ？間違いを犯す権利のために戦ったっていいさ」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps we are. But what difference does it make? You want to live however you think is best, don't you? Not as you are told to live? The right to make mistakes is one worth fighting for."

traits.locale_text: 「たぶんね。でも、どんな違いがあるんだい？アンタは自分のベストを尽くして何としても生き延びたいんだろ？生きるよう命令されたから、ってわけじゃないだろ？間違いを犯す権利のために戦ったっていいさ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht. Doch was macht das für einen Unterschied? Man will doch leben, wie man es für das Beste hält, oder? Nicht, wie man es gesagt bekommt? Das Recht, Fehler zu machen, ist ein Recht, für das es sich zu kämpfen lohnt."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps we are. But what difference does it make? You want to live however you think is best, don't you? Not as you are told to live? The right to make mistakes is one worth fighting for."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht. Doch was macht das für einen Unterschied? Man will doch leben, wie man es für das Beste hält, oder? Nicht, wie man es gesagt bekommt? Das Recht, Fehler zu machen, ist ein Recht, für das es sich zu kämpfen lohnt."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Perhaps we are. But what difference does it make? You want to live however you think is best, don't you? Not as you are told to live? The right to make mistakes is one worth fighting for."

languages.text: "Belki de. Fakat bunun ne önemi var ki? En iyi olduğunu düşündüğün şekilde yaşamak istiyorsun, değil mi? Sana söylendiği şekilde değil yani. Hata yapabilme hakkı, uğruna savaşmaya değerdir."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps we are. But what difference does it make? You want to live however you think is best, don't you? Not as you are told to live? The right to make mistakes is one worth fighting for."

traits.locale_text: "Belki de. Fakat bunun ne önemi var ki? En iyi olduğunu düşündüğün şekilde yaşamak istiyorsun, değil mi? Sana söylendiği şekilde değil yani. Hata yapma hakkı için savaşmaya değer."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
